name: The Rooms (JudyM)
description:
A room escape game with puzzles! Finding out the hidden items in three rooms!

The female protagonist is a psychologist;

Every patient says she is an optimistic and positive person in everyday life.

However,

she has a SECRET.

Find out six rapped paper pieces in her bedroom, her office and the kitchen.

Control:

Left click to examine items;

Right click to go back;

Escape key to quit the game at any time.
